name: Dawn of Abyss
description:
This game was made for the 4th Watch+Jam gamejam, where the theme was "buildings that dont look like buildings"... Full disclosure-- I basically ignored the theme. WHOOPS. I was just having too hard of a time with it, and I decided I just wanted to FINISH a game for once.

So this is officially MY FIRST EVER FINISHED VIDEOGAME! I hope you enjoy it.

------------------------------------------------------

Adjudicator Glas has asked the Council for help... In return she gets granted an Inspector. As an Inspector its your duty to speak with the four Lords and settle the issues that have arisen.

Find Adjudicator Dragan, help Adjudicator Glas, then return home to the Council and seal the fate of the four Lords.
